text:
What is the capital of Sweden ?
1) Copenhague 2) PewDiePie 3) StockHolm  4) MeatBalls

Who has been president of the United States ?
1) Harrison Ford 2) Henry Ford 3) Francis Ford Coppola  4) Gerald Ford

What words do not exist ?
1) Unabashed 2) Nonplussed 3) Whomst 4) Diaphnous

Without reading the second question, who has been President of the US ?
1) Geralt Ford 2) Gerald Ford 3) Gerard Ford 4) Han Solo

What is the capital of Botswana ?
1) Gaborone 2) Windhoek 3) Harare 4) Lilongwe
